casebody.data:
Kenny GUICE, Anthony Fernandez, Chad Morgan, Kevin Morgan, Larry James Hebert, Wayne Tureai, and Stacy Tureau Creasy Wife of/and Terry Creasy
v.
VULCAN CHEMICALS, a Business Group of Vulcan Materials Company, Vulcan Chemicals Investments, L.L.C., and Vulcan Chlorakali, L.L.C., Industrial Coatings Contractors, Inc., and International Maintenance Corporation NO. 2018-C-0821 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 21, 2018

Denied.
